## Looking to set your event  
apart from all the others?

## Look no further!!

## photo: Lizzie Schlafer

## We are a mobile bar company offering an  
experiential service for any type of event.  
Choose service with one of our rentals,  
or simply hire us to be your bartenders.  
Either way, we want to take care of all the  
details so you worry about nothing.

## Why should you hire us?

## Well, we are awesome, but here's some other reasons too...

a+n_maebphoto_rec-548

MobileBar_allison-ewing-photography.jpg

untitled-86

a+n_maebphoto_rec-548

1/3

## 1.  
We love everyone and want to help everyone celebrate life's big or small
moments!

## 2.  
We make really good cocktails and we will help you curate the perfect menu for
your event.

Additionally, we figure out the alcohol order, place it, and have it delivered
the day of your event.

EmilyReneePhotos_SignatureCocktails

MobileBar, signature cocktails, boho wedding, Richfield Heritage Preserve,
Northeast Ohio, Cleveland Ohio Mobile Bar

## 3.  
We take care of everything, so you worry about nothing!!

We supply everything, as part of our service, with the exception of the
alcohol.

Because of this, all alcohol is yours to

keep at the end of the event.

All cups, straws, napkins, ice, garnishes,  non-alcoholic mixers, and a menu
are provided by us

## 4.  
Photo opportunities galore!  
We love when clients get photos with the bars. Feel free to hop inside, step
behind, or mix up a drink or two!

Please remind your photographer to add photos at the bar to your shot list.
It's an incredible way to remember one of the biggest parts of your wedding.

## 5.  
We have a bar to fit any  
look or space.

\- The Speakeasy -

15' long, 6' wide, & 9' tall

​

\- Kurby -

15' long, 6' wide, & 9' tall

​

\- White Bar & Taps -

Bar - 6' long, 2' deep

Taps - 3' wide, 3 ' deep, 5'tall

​

\- Wooden Bar -

4.8' wide, 2' deep, 4.5' tall

​

​

## Based in beautiful Medina, Ohio.  
We serve all of Northeast Ohio, including Cleveland, Akron,  
Canton,Youngstown, Ashland, and Wooster.  
We will travel beyond our region with proper mileage fee.  
Please inquire if interested.  


#### Do you have questions?

Contact Us

Text/Call Us

FAQs

## Nickie + Allie

We hired Heather and Rob for our daughterswedding on Sept. 25th. The Speakeasy
Trailer was a hit! Heather and Rob were so easy to work with and so
professional. The signature drinks were amazing! Thank you Thirsty Goose for
helping in making our daughters wedding amazing!

## Jess + Colin

Working with The Thirsty Goose for our wedding is hands down one of the best
decisions we made for the day. When we were deciding between a few options, we
ultimately decided to go with them because we felt like they would bring the
energy we were looking for-and we were right!

## Andrea + Peter

These two were wonderful!!

So easy to work with, so responsive, and so kind; our guests love the bar
trailer and it went with our wedding theme so well!

## Betsy + Bill

The Thirsty Goose exceeded our expectations! The trailer was the topic of all
our guests conversations and I would highly recommend hiring them for
receptions, graduations, or any social gatherings. Truly, Heather know what
she's doing from start to finish.

## SERVICES & RENTALS

#### Let us cater the bar at your next special event!

##### We Carry Liquor Liability & General Insurance

## SO, HOW DOES THIS WORK?

##### STEP ONE:  
WHAT DOES YOUR EVENT NEED?

##### STEP TWO:  
PICK YOUR PACKAGE

##### STEP THREE:  
GIVE US THE DEETS!

RENTAL COST

+

BAR PACKAGE

+

ADD-ONS, TAXES + FEES

What rental fits your style and overall vibe? We have multiple rentals to
choose from to fit any style and budget. Don't need a rental, we can provide
just bartending service as well, or just batch up some cocktail mix to make
hosting a heck of a lot simpler!! The cost of the rental is additional to the
bar package and any add-ons.

We have 4 bar packages to choose from. What will work best for you and your
guests? We have an option to fit all needs, but if you think something else
will work better, please don't hesitate to reach out for a customized menu!
Please see the options below!

Needs a coffee set up or bar tables? We have plenty of additional packages and
items to rent. From lawn games to furniture, we've got everything needed for
an amazing bar set up and then some!! This is the point also where we will get
all you event details; hours, guest count, location and anything else. We'll
work up your proposal and total in taxes and fees. When you get a proposal
from us, we will also include an estimate for your cost of alcohol.

I'm Interested In Booking

Proposals do not include the cost of alcohol. Average total cost for our
services range from $2100 to $3500. Hours, guest count, and chosen bar package
could make this range vary.

​

##### STEP 2 : BAR PACKAGE

## Which Service Package Works Best For You?

Straight Up

$5.50/guest

Package Includes:



Service of beer & wine*

Ice for chilling beverages

Bar Essentials (Ice, Cups, Straws, Napkins)

Menu Board

Menu/Ordering Assistance

Delivery/Return of Alcohol**

​

Alcohol Not Included

*Service with 1 bartender per 100 guests. 

Additional bartenders will need to be added if guest count exceeds that
number.

**When applicable

​

​

Shaken, Not Stirred

$8.50/guest

Package Includes:

​

Service of beer & wine,

plus 2 signature cocktail(s)*

Includes All Premium Mixers & Garnishes

Seasonal Menu of Suggested Cocktails

Taste Test

Bar Essentials (Ice, Cups, Straws, Napkins)

Menu Board

Menu/Ordering Assistance

Delivery of Alcohol***

​

Alcohol Not Included

* Can Be Kegged And Served On Draft

*Service with 1 bartender per 65 guests. 

Additional bartenders will need to be added if guest count exceeds that
number.

***When applicable

​

On The Rocks

$7.50/guest

Package Includes:

​

Service of beer & wine,

plus spirits & mixers*

4 Mixers of Your Choice

(Mixers for use of mixed drinks only. Non-alcoholic drink options for guests
must be added on separately)

Basic Drink Garnishes

(i.e. lemons, limes & cherries)

Bar Essentials (Ice, Cups, Straws, Napkins)

Menu Board

Menu/Ordering Assistance

Delivery of Alcohol**

​

Alcohol Not Included

*Service with 1 bartender per 75 guests. 

Additional bartenders will need to be added if guest count exceeds that
number.

**When applicable

With A Twist

Service of beer & wine, spirits & mixers,

& 2 signature cocktail(s)*
